meanings.definition: Having the most pleasant taste or flavor.
meanings.sent1: The savoriest dish at the party was the chocolate cake.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared the savoriest soup I have ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: Everyone agreed that the savoriest part of the picnic was the fresh fruit salad.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the savoriest melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The savoriest memory from the vacation was the homemade ice cream.

meanings.sent1: The savoriest movie of the year was a heartwarming comedy.

meanings.sent3: The savoriest part of the day was when the family gathered for dinner.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the savoriest sight after a long day at work.
meanings.sent5: The savoriest moment of the trip was watching the sunset over the ocean.
